document.title: License Agreements
document.paragraph:
This section contains the http://www.eiffel.comEiffel Software's license agreements related to Eiffel, Eiffel for .NET and EiffelEnvision. in_this_section
2 In This Section
eula_enterprise.xml EiffelEnvision EULA
The EiffelEnvision End-User License Agreement (EULA).
iffel.xml ISE Free Eiffel Library License (IFFEL)
The license describing the terms applicable to the open-source EiffelBase libraries.
